repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.physdesc: Papers (documents), autobiographies, photographs, memorabilia, clippings (information artifacts).
did.abstract: Unpublished autobiography of Ellsworth D. Opie, a Pullman Conductor on primarily Northeastern lines (1914-1955) and officer of Order of Sleeping Car Conductors (1923-1943).

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Ellsworth D. Opie was a Pullman Conductor on primarily Northeastern lines (1914-1955) and officer of Order of Sleeping Car Conductors (1923-1943).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the unpublished autobiography of Ellsworth D. Opie, a Pullman Conductor on primarily Northeastern lines (1914-1955) and officer of Order of Sleeping Car Conductors (1923-1943). Also included are a few newspaper clippings, photographs, and memorabilia.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ellsworth D. Opie "Transition: An Autobiography" #5507. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
